Here is a concise summary of the transcript:

The transcript appears to be a recording of a news report or briefing about Russia's proposal for a ceasefire with Ukraine. The report mentions that Russia is proposing direct talks with Ukraine, and that Foreign Minister Lavrov has announced that he will present a memorandum containing Russia's positions to Turkey. However, Ukraine is demanding to receive the paper in advance in order to prepare. The report also mentions that Ukraine's President Zelenskiy has called on the international community to put more pressure on Russia. The report also touches on the US President Trump's hesitation to justify new sanctions against Russia.
